description: Manages SNMP target host configurations on HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

interface_name.description: Name of the interface to send the trap message.

security_level.description: Security level indicating whether to use authentication and encryption.

is_public_net.description: To enable or disable Public Net-manager for target Host.

connect_port.description: Udp port used by SNMP agent to connect the Network management.

host_name.description: Unique name to identify target host entry.

recv_port.description: UDP Port number used by network management to receive alarm messages.

notify_type.description: To configure notify type as trap or inform.
